mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_name AS "userName", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_account AS "bankAccount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_remittancer a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.user_name LIKE '%'||#{userName}||'%' '%'+#{userName}+'%' concat('%',#{userName},'%')
AND a.bank_name LIKE '%'||#{bankName}||'%' '%'+#{bankName}+'%' concat('%',#{bankName},'%')
AND a.bank_account LIKE '%'||#{bankAccount}||'%' '%'+#{bankAccount}+'%' concat('%',#{bankAccount},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_remittancer( id, user_name, bank_name, bank_account, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userName}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_remittancer SET user_name = #{userName}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_account = #{bankAccount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
